code: import React from"react";import{ThemeContext}from"../../context/Theme";import logo from"../../../src/assets/logo1.png";import{useContext,useState}from"react";import{ViewOffer}from"../../pages/admin/ViewOffer";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const OfferItemCard=_ref=>{let{setSelected,user,offer_data}=_ref;const[theme,setTheme]=useContext(ThemeContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`relative max-w-xs mx-auto shadow-lg rounded-lg overflow-hidden m-4 min-w-55 ${theme==="night"?"bg-night text-white":"bg-fantasy text-black"}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute top-2 right-2",children:user.role!="P"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"btn_update",onClick:()=>{setSelected("UpdateOffer");},className:" hover:text-yellow-500 font-bold px-4 rounded",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-edit"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"w-full h-auto",src:logo,alt:"card"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"font-bold text-xl mb-2",children:offer_data.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-base",children:offer_data.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-4 flex flex-col sm:flex-row",children:user.role==="P"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-green-500 px-4 py-2 rounded mr-2 mb-2 sm:mb-0 text-white",children:"Buy"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"btn_item_details",onClick:()=>{setSelected("ViewOffer");},className:"bg-blue-500 px-4 py-2 rounded text-white",children:"See Details"})})]})]});};
